alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 4:24AM CST until January 26 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Tombigbee River near Amory Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee Buttahatchie River near Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Tombigbee River at Bigbee, Tombigbee River near Amory, Tombigbee River Aberdeen L & D... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Buttahatchie River...including Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 14.4 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 430 PM CST.
